name: Get My Sword
description:
a game submitted to the Bored Pixels Jam 8

What it's about:

The princess has been kidnapped... the hero must go and save her but he needs his sword...

Run into the castle and bring him his sword!

Move barrels, open gates and avoid spikes to get to the chest which contains the sword.

Commands:

[A] [D] (or arrows)  -> Move

[Space] -> Jump

[E] -> Interact with objects

[Left Click] -> Next Dialogue
